title: (x) Condensed and rounded mystery font. - Brauer Neue {James L}
content:
This is the typeface used for the cover lines on Print magazine. What is it? I've used all online methods of identifying it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130420044729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters3_3828.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130420044729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters_5476.jpg)
author: cmorgannorris
